generated_description: A player has  a control which is a robot
actual_description: When earth receives a threat that a nearby colony of aliens is about to launch an attack, it sends a small spy robot to check onto the closest enemy base out of many to check their weapon advances and preparations.

generated_description: A player has  a control which is a robot
actual_description: After the first minute, the game gets more intense, with bombs raining down on our poor little robot and many mobs spawning to stop our little hero.

generated_description: A player has  a control which is a robot
actual_description: Our army can walk through and defeat the base if the robot succeeds in its mission.

generated_description: A player has  a control which is a robot
actual_description: The robot will be running in the forward direction.

generated_description: A player has  a control which is a robot
actual_description: The robot's main objective is to find and hack the system that can 'Disable' the 'weaponries', which can be found at the end of each level that can be attained after going a certain distance.

generated_description: A player has  a control which is a robot
actual_description: When the robot's cover gets blown, the whole army chases our little robot to stop him from his mission.

generated_description: A player has  a control which is a robot
actual_description: After running for a certain distance or given time, the level will be cleared, and the robot will move on to the second phase to chase robots away or press the self-destruct button, which destroys the enemy base at the end of each level.
